title: V (1983) The Original MiniSeries COMPLETE
description:
The complete 'V' series from 1983, contains:
DVD rips of V - The Original Miniseries and V - The Final Battle
plus all 19 episodes of the TV series.

*** THIS IS THE ORIGINAL 80's SERIES IN FULL, nothing to do with the 2009 remake ***

They came to Earth, disguised as friends. But instead, they took our water and our people for food. But there is a Resistance... to save our people and our planet. These are the stories of this Resistance...
